about_the_game:
The Christmas Spirit is here with this amazing bundle to set your mood and boost your collection. This is a great +300% value offer of Card Packs, Diamonds, Glitter Vials, and Timesand, including the curious Fresh Recruit who is again in trouble!




Includes:
  • x10 Classic Card Packs to unlock the cards from your favorite Mythology
  • x2 Glitter Vials to animate your cards in the near future
  • x500 Diamonds to get anything you want, even a fiancée in some cultures
  • x800 Timesand to craft your favorite cards
  • Exclusive Christmas Spirit 2019 Card Back
  • Exclusive Christmas Spirit 2019 Fresh Recruit Skin



Are you ready to embrace the Christmas Spirit and crush your enemies with all the goodies you will get from this limited offer?

When you purchase this item, go to the in-game home screen and click on the present on the right of the screen.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 or equivalent, minimum 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: The Christmas Spirit package is a perfect addition to your collection, which will not only contribute to your Christmas mood but it will also boost your collection with a +300% value of items.
